name: Iga-Ryu
description: The town of Takayama has been in peace for the last three centuries. Their civilization has been blessed by the lands oni spirit Mayama, powering their society on the valuable nectar of the gods, made into familiar human treats. However, everything changed when a new force from the island Aogashima attacked. These Aogashima samurai pillaged and disgraced their sacred ground and took control of himeji castle where their tyrannical reign began. Mayama’s chosen kunoichi, Tsuru decided to take matters into her own hands and return the plentiful bounty back to the town and defeat the Aogashima samurai.
